channel.title: Take out ::Pure command! Help!
channel.description: Title says all, How do you take out the ::pure command. Base PI

item.title: Take out ::Pure command! Help!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“emtrescue, post:9, topic:400174”]by looking at code again it might look like this

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“pure”) && c.puremaster == 0) {
int i = 0;
c.getPA().addSkillXP((15000000), 0);
c.getPA().addSkillXP((15000000), 2);
c.getPA().addSkillXP((15000000), 3);
c.getPA().addSkillXP((15000000), 4);
c.getPA().addSkillXP((15000000), 6);
c.playerXP[3] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5;
c.playerLevel[3] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(3);
c.puremaster = 1;
} else if (playerCommand.startsWith(“pure”) && c.puremaster == 1) {
c.sendMessage(" You already did this command ")
}[/quote]

Why are there parenthesis around the first argument of addSkillXP

Read full topic

item.title: Take out ::Pure command! Help!
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

by looking at code again it might look like this

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“pure”) && c.puremaster == 0) {
int i = 0;
c.getPA().addSkillXP((15000000), 0);
c.getPA().addSkillXP((15000000), 2);
c.getPA().addSkillXP((15000000), 3);
c.getPA().addSkillXP((15000000), 4);
c.getPA().addSkillXP((15000000), 6);
c.playerXP[3] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5;
c.playerLevel[3] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]);
c.getPA().refreshSkill(3);
c.puremaster = 1;
} else if (playerCommand.startsWith(“pure”) && c.puremaster == 1) {
c.sendMessage(" You already did this command ")
}

Read full topic

item.title: Take out ::Pure command! Help!
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

Yes, but there should be a } under that that you delete too, so delete this:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("pure") && c.puremaster == 0) { int i = 0; c.getPA().addSkillXP((15000000), 0); c.getPA().addSkillXP((15000000), 2); c.getPA().addSkillXP((15000000), 3); c.getPA().addSkillXP((15000000), 4); c.getPA().addSkillXP((15000000), 6); c.playerXP[3] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5; c.playerLevel[3] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(3); c.puremaster = 1; }

Looks like I got beat to it, lol.

Read full topic
